extracurricularActivities.description: Speaker Buddy - Assisted and guided speakers throughout the event to ensure smooth transitions and adherence to schedules.

extracurricularActivities.description: Received UMP101 Global Citizenship credit with a grade of A from participating in a 2-week special summer program to promote Asian language, culture, arts, cuisine, and critical issues in the region under the theme "Global Citizenship" as a representative of King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi

achievementsAwards.title: JUNCTION Hackathon
achievementsAwards.description: Won 2nd Place in the Tech Challenge by n8n by developing an AI-assisted security assessor that converts product data (name, URL, vendor, hash) into a CISO-ready brief using agentic AI with n8n and Gemini.

achievementsAwards.title: F10: Fintech Hackathon
achievementsAwards.description: Got to the top 15 finalists out of 40 teams as "What the Hack" team to solve the problem statements given by Julius Bar (private banking): find the way to create a touchpoint for the next generation.

achievementsAwards.title: We Power Road Safety Digital Creator by Shell
achievementsAwards.description: Won a recognition award as "Team V Power" in gamification categories by developing digital learning materials for schoolchildren to reinforce a safety mindset.

achievementsAwards.title: Data Science Hackathon by RISE Accelerator
achievementsAwards.description: Got to the last 8 finalists out of 32 teams that participated as a team to find ideas and solutions to solve problem statements given by the leading companies in Thailand.

achievementsAwards.title: KMUTT Qualified Hands-on Engineer (Monotsukuri Engineer)
achievementsAwards.description: Awarded a full scholarship to visit 5 top universities and 11 factories in  Japan (only 18 students in the faculty of engineering are selected) to learn more about Japanese work ethic and culture.

achievementsAwards.title: Workshop Better UX, Better KMUTT
achievementsAwards.description: Won best project prize by designing and prototyping University's shuttle bus stop sign with improved UX design from identified user pain points.
